page.description: Saves the contents of the session-state key to the destination file under IIS.
page.syntax: Context.Session.SaveSessionFileToFile as L (Key as C, DestinationFile as C)

argument.name: Key
argument.description: The key of the data in the session-state collection. The value of key is a file name without any path components.

argument.name: DestinationFile
argument.description: The full path of the file into which the session-state data is to be saved.

page.discussion: Context.Session.SaveSessionFileToFile() saves the contents of the session-state key to the destination file under IIS. Under the stand-alone application server, the session file in the stand-alone application server's session folder is copied to the destination file. Check *[link:Context.Session.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.

section.note: The session file might have been created in the first place using either of these methods:

section.title: Example
section.example: context.session.saveFileToSessionFile( c fileName, c key) context.session.saveDataAsFile( b data, c key)
